attributes.action: To ensure that all airlines that operate in UK airspace provide toilet facilities free of charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With airlines talking about charging for more and more services some are considering charges for use of their toilets in flight. I feel that such a charge is not acceptable on many grounds, disability, illness, etc. If you need to use a toilet whilst airborne you have no alternative. The government should pass a law stating that all airlines that operate in UK airspace must allow passengers to use the toilet facilities free of charge.
